Identification.LongTitle: An Act to establish the Greenhouse Gas Technology Investment Fund for the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions and the removal of greenhouse gases from the atmosphere
Identification.ShortTitle: Greenhouse Gas Technology Investment Fund Act

ReaderNote.Note: [Enacted by section 96 of chapter 30 of the Statutes of Canada, 2005, repealed before coming into force, see 2008, c. 20, s. 3.]
